infos.value: You're the remnants of the Leonis forces, aren't you?
The jig's up! We know what you're up to!
You've got something really, really, really important in that carriage, right?
I don't know where you caught wind of that, but don't you know that curiosity killed the cat?
Well, now my curiosity is piqued all the more.
Yeah, it's decided. We're taking the carriage!
